media:group.media:title: A (Blind-Accessible) History of Blind Gaming
media:group.media:description:
(2022 Update: Lost and Hound is now out on Steam!)
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054350/Lost_and_Hound/



Thanks to /r/blindgamers for helping make this content blind-accessible. If you'd like, try listening to the video instead of watching it! 

English Translation of Regrets of the Wind: https://switchgaming.blogspot.com/2018/10/script-for-real-sound-regret-of-wind.html
